channel.title: Adding to Donator List When Logged in
channel.description: How can i make it so that when a player logs in they are auto added to the donator list. Like if i were doing a special event for free donator. Oh i am on Delta and a 317 Server

item.title: Adding to Donator List When Logged in
item.dc:creator: @genoarch genoarch
item.description:
@genoarch wrote:

For my donators they have to have that flag and they have to have their name appended to a donators.txt file how can i do that too?

Read full topic
item.source: Adding to Donator List When Logged in

item.title: Adding to Donator List When Logged in
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Change the int in you’re player class

public int memberStatus = 0;
change it to the number you’re donor rank is
Example,

public int memberStatus = 1; // reg donor
public int memberStatus = 2; // super donor

Read full topic
item.source: Adding to Donator List When Logged in
